about.title: About
about.intro.p1:
Hello! I run this Kingshot fan site as a hobby to organize strategy information.
Thank you sincerely to everyone who visits and supports the site.
about.intro.p2:
This is my first time running a website, so there have been many trials and mistakes.
If you find bugs or issues, please feel free to report them.
I will keep improving it step by step.
about.intro.p3: Wishing you a wonderful and happy 2026.
about.ads.p1:
KingshotData.kr is also used as a testbed for various experiments.
Ads may appear at any time during this process.
about.ads.p2:
Ads may be affiliate ads or test ads.
If you click an ad only when it is genuinely useful, it helps a lot.
This is never a request to buy something you don't need.
about.copyright.p1:
All game images and data are copyrighted by Century Games.
This site is for non-commercial, informational purposes, and some materials may be cited with proper attribution.
about.disclaimer.p1:
Displayed values may differ from the actual game due to updates.
This site assumes no legal responsibility for outcomes resulting from the use of its information.
